title: CAREER: Language Technologies Against the Language of Social Discrimination
explanation: The text explicitly lists "gender, race, age, sexual orientation, ethnicity" as factors by which disadvantaged groups are "discriminated," placing the term firmly within a social and political context of inequality and identity.
